column4: hi, i|ve got a problem> mz kezboard lazout is now US, but it should be german, I alreadz changed it back to german, but after rebooting it is US again, whz, and what can i do against that? (there are three things which i did before this error happened> 1> resetted the computer (unclean shutdown), plugging the kezboard off, and back in, and using the screen kezboard at the login screen once) after that the lazout was wrong
at loggin screen, choose the language session to german
thank you, now I have german layout again. :-)
